item.title: Expanded Lineup Of 2016 LG TVs, Led By LG OLED And LG Super UHD, Recommended By Netflix
item.description:
Expanded Lineup Of 2016 LG TVs, Led By LG OLED And LG Super UHD, Recommended By Netflix

April 6, 2016 /PRNewswire/ -- LG Electronics' expanded line-up of top-tier 2016 4K Ultra HD TVs - including OLED and SUPER UHD TVs - have been selected by Netflix for its Netflix Recommended TV program, marking the second consecutive year that LG TVs have been recommended by the world's leading Internet TV network.

item.title: Hands On First Look: VIZIO Launches New P-Series with Dolby Vision & SmartCast
item.description:
Hands On First Look: VIZIO Launches New P-Series with Dolby Vision & SmartCast

Some exciting news on the display front, once again proving 2016 to be a very good year for considering a 4K Ultra High Definition upgrade. VIZIO has not only launched a major overhaul to its well-reviewed P-Series 4K UHD displays, but is releasing this new iteration as the first product to run on a new wireless, entertainment ecosystem dubbed SmartCast.

item.title: Exclusive: 'Ghostbusters' films get Ultra HD treatment in June
item.description:
Exclusive: 'Ghostbusters' films get Ultra HD treatment in June

Slimer and the gang have never looked or sounded this good. The original Ghostbusters films - the first in 1984 and its sequel five years later - are getting a 4K Ultra HD disc release June 7 that will feature souped-up picture and sound for those with premium TV and home-theater systems, with anniversary Blu-ray discs included containing previously released bonus material, commentaries and interactive modes.
